A Clockwork Orange meets The Skin I Live In. Never thought in my 20 years of fapping to gender bender stuffs I'd see both of them combined into a drawn Japanese porn. Disturbing stuff.

is this gay?
Hehe glow-in-the-dark pp

Reminds me of a Manhua I read where the Female MC is saved cause her childhood friend broke protocol and gave her an essential body part of a rich man's dying Fiancee! High on revenge as the Guy believed his fiancee didn't have to die if the CF didn't operate on her (when it was clear she was going to die anyway! But even then he was also pissed at her body being violated without consent from him, the person who should have been consulted over this first!) he had the CF sent to prison and forced the Female MC to live with him! Ordering her to act EXACTLY LIKE HIS FIANCEE COMPLETELY DOWN TO HAVE HER ID STOLEN FROM HER, despite the fact she never gave her consent to the operation in general (she was in a coma when it happened) and was completely innocent! the Man was clearly using her to also hurt her CF by using her safety to keep him in prison while forcing him to know what was happening to her from time to time (luckily no NTR garbage as it's unclear if he's the romantic LI or not)

Also at this point. The MC looks EXACTLY like the Man's Wife in Chapter 1. From the Looks to the Hair Style now! (I mean the reason the MC was nervous around men was because it's heavily hinted that the Guy "messaged" his old friend on what happened to him and her new identity so he'd attempt to rape him....and arranged for in officer to be near the area to save him at the last moment so he'd insert himself into her life and manipulate her in the way he did! (If this gets a chapter 3! It may go dark, as in a Clockwork Orange, the husband there once he realized the MC's ID attempt to kill him via activating the brainwashing via music trapping him in a room with said music blasting! Here the husband is aware from the start, So it's a toss if the MC discovers "who his wife was originally" or she never finds out and loses her old identity completely as he starts calling her by his wife's old name and never finds out the truth! Already completely brainwashed)
You know how to get a super orgasm with a penis when your about to cum stop the do it again and again is like a energy charge building up

Not so wholesome when you remember this story is a Japanese Hentai Gender Bender of a Clockwork Orange! 

The MC is just like the MC in that story...right down to ending up living in the custody of the man who's wife the MC was responsible for gangraping early in the story which resulted in her death.....difference here is the clues make it clear the widowed husband is aware of the MC's identity at the start and manipulated events to assure control over her. Compered to in a Clockwark Orange where it took awhile before the Widowed Husband discovered the MC's identity as the Man who invaded his home that day with his gang to gangrape his dead wife when the MC ended up saying something he had said at the time of the incident..The one thing the widow husband remembered clearly from that event when he was knocked out by the MC then! The man trapoed him in a room with the music that was meant to cause the MC pain when heard from his rehabilitation in an attempt to kill him for that!
Low-tier story. Not wholesome. Should have married first

yeah this is just one of those thing. Wholesome tho.
